trans-unit.source: Represents a rectangle annotation.
A rectangle annotation can display text inside the rectangle, in addition to being displayed as a rectangle only.
So you can annotate using a rectangle or a rectangle with text inside it.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPathPoint"></xref> class.
Gets the annotation type.
For internal use, should not be used.
The annotation type.
Gets or sets the background color of the annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background.
Gets or sets the gradient style of the annotation.

Two colors are used to draw the gradient, a primary color that is specified the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and a secondary color that is specified with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> value used to draw an annotation background.
Gets or sets the hatch style of an annotation background.

Two colors are used to draw the hatching, a primary color that is specified the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property, and a secondary color that is specified with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the background.
Gets or sets the secondary color for an annotation background.

This color is used with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> property is used.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
Gets or sets the line color of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the annotation line.
Gets or sets the line style of an annotation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> value used to draw the line style of an annotation.
Gets or sets the line width, in pixels, of an annotation.
An `integer` value that represents the line width, in pixels.
